directory.description: Directory to execute the rake task from (default: /var/lib/jenkins/enterprise-dist)

gpg2.description: Whether or not the target host is using GPGv2 (default: false)

use_rvm.description: Whether or not the target host is using rvm (default: false)

user.description: The user to prime the gpg key for (default: jenkins)

passphrase.description: The passphrase for the gpg key
